document.full_text: actress january jones, who plays sullen housewife betty draper on the emmy-award winning television drama "mad men," is about to become a single mother, people magazine reported thursday.
document.title: "mad men" actress pregnant, father not revealed
lines_and_colors: actress january jones, who plays sullen housewife betty draper on the emmy-award winning television drama "mad men," is about to become a single mother, people magazine reported thursday.
